titleStmt.title: The journals of all the Parliaments during the reign of Queen Elizabeth both of the House of Lords and House of Commons / collected by Sir Simonds D'Ewes ... Knight and Baronet ; revised and published by Paul Bowes ..., Esq.
titleStmt.author: D'Ewes, Simonds, Sir, 1602-1650.
Bowes, Paul, d. 1702.

notesStmt.note: Engraved frontispiece: Queen Elizabeth in Parliament.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
